Scenario.UserTask: You would like to play a game of trivia. You've already answered some of the questions, so you should start from question 2 and play 5 questions. You have answers for the following questions: (4) poem, (1) cesium. For the rest, try your best!
Scenario.WizardTask: Let the user play a trivia game. Query for and ask the questions until the user wants to stop. Note: Please DO NOT CHANGE THE COMPARATOR for the question number, i.e. leave it as 'is_equal_to'.
